conbody.p: This method identifies and maps the similar zones between the baseline and checkpoint images, highlighting the layout differences between the two images.

li.p: The AI engine will identify the zones on the images.

conbody.p: In Katalon TestOps, the zones are categorized into 3 types:

ul.li: Identical (green border): shows UI zones identically rendered in both images.
Distinguishable (red border): shows UI zones that look identical for the most parts but have some recognizable distinctions.
Missing/New (pink border): shows UI zones that exist in one image but not in the other.

conbody.p: This method is helpful to review changes identified by the pixel-based comparison, and it spots the changes in layout, color, font, and element location.
